weka.gui.visualize
Class VisualizePanel3D

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  weka.gui.visualize.VisualizePanel3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class VisualizePanel3D
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Panel that displays a 3D scatter plot. Requires Java 3D to be installed.

Version:
$Revision: 8108 $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
See Also:

public void setAxes(int x,

Sets the indexes of the axis to be visualized (0-based indexing).

Parameters:
x - the x index
y - the y index
z - the z index
c - the color index

                         int c)
Set the instances to display

Parameters:
toPlot - the instances to display
x - the index of the attribute for the x axis
y - the index of the attribute for the y axis
z - the index of the attribute for the z axis
c - the index of the attribute for coloring
